name: Super Tote Pattern
description:
Super Tote Pattern by Anna Graham

A generous size tote bag with great features, including a recessed zipper, large interior elasticized pockets, front pocket, and fun piping!

name: The Staple Dress Pattern
description:
The Staple Dress Pattern by April Rhodes

Designed to be simple yet flattering. This dress has a lot of ease through the bust and hip, with elastic shirring at the waist to cinch it in. The waistline can be customized and adjusted up and down to accent the wearer’s natural waist. Choose between two hemlines, a classic straight hem or a more dramatic drop hem style, with optional side-seam pockets. Cute alone or belted, with flats, boots or heels, it’s a year-round wardrobe essential.

name: The Date Night Dress & Simple Slip Pattern
description:
2 Garments in One Pattern

THE DATE NIGHT DRESS is an effortless garment with subtle drama. The flutter sleeves flatter arms and the open armhole can be slightly sultry, offering a teasing peek at the Simple Slip or perhaps a lacy bra underneath. There are several ways to style--wear it loose, with a ready-made belt, with shirring, or with a fabric sash. Both the box pleat at the back of the neck and the soft shirttail hem add a bit more interest, and you can show as much or as little leg as you like by shortening or lengthening the pattern pieces.

SIMPLE SLIP is a quick-to-sew, easy-to-wear piece. It’s perfect for layering under any dress, but completely suitable for wearing alone. It’s especially comfy for bed!

Suitable for beginning sewers.

Full color photos and instructions for each step. 

Includes women's sizes xs-xxl.

name: Half Square Triangle Sampler Quilt Pattern
description:
Half Square Triangle Sampler Quilt Pattern by Jeni Baker of In Color Order

Create twelve blocks using half-squares triangles (HST), discovering the possibilities they provide. Two HST construction methods included.

name: Color Hex Quilt Pattern
description:
Color Hex Quilt Pattern by Jeni Baker of In Color Order

Colors from the traditional color wheel are used to create this bold design. Bonus quilt, Floral Hex, is perfect for featuring your favorite fabrics!

name: Side Braid Quilt Pattern
description:
Side Braid Quilt Pattern by Jeni Baker of In Color Order

A quick and easy, fat quarter friendly, quilt pattern that can be made in two styles!

name: Arithmetic Quilt Pattern
description:
Arithmetic Quilt Pattern by Jeni Baker of In Color Order

A bold, geometric, plus quilt pattern using simple patchwork techniques in six sizes.

name: Vintage Nine Patch Pattern
description:
Vintage Nine Patch Pattern by Jeni Baker of In Color Order

This sweet take on a traditional nine-patch design is great for showing off your favorite fabrics or clearing out the scrap bin!

name: Lined Drawstring Bag Pattern
description:
Lined Drawstring Bag Pattern by Jeni Baker of In Color Order

Easy lined drawstring bag, featuring eight sizes and custom sizing instructions! Perfect for beginners!

name: Banyan Tappered Pants, Tee & Tunic Pattern
description:
You have asked for boys and knit patterns and we delivered! This pattern package is chock full of handsome and stylish staples that will easily take you through any season and will work equally well for boys and girls!

The pants are a fitted modern style with a pleated flat front and our signature adjustable back. You choose between a long leg length or some severely cute short shorts. The pant is tapered through the legs and ends with a fold up that just takes this style up a couple of notches! Pair it with the EASY to make tee or  a slim girls handkerchief  tunic length hem.

We promise to help elevate your sewing ability while we guide you step by step through a professional fly zip installation and plenty of sewing tips for wovens and knits!

Available In Sizes: 18mo -8/9yr (slim fit)

Included in each Figgy’s pattern you will receive a little something extra especially for you; a lovely woven label! These labels will enable you to give the garment a professional finished touch and it states clearly that this garment has been lovingly crafted by hand!

name: Sunki Dress Pattern
description:
This pocket dress/tunic is not only stylish but comfortable. The sewists will have so much fun choosing fabric for this versatle design. We will guide you through the – not as hard as you think – process of installing a zipper and making those adorable pockets. The dress/tunic includes special pleated shoulders that give a feminine touch. The leggins go together in a snap and before you know it you have an outfit. 

Available in Sizes:  18mo – 8/9

*The fit of this adorable dress runs slim and the finished length (depending on the leg length of your little one) is mid-thigh.  If you have a little one in between sizes we suggest using the larger size.  If your little one has long legs we suggest measuring the pattern and adjust accordingly.

Included in each Figgy’s pattern you will receive a little something extra especially for you, a lovely woven label is included . These labels will enable you to give the garment a professional finished touch and it states clearly that this garment has been lovingly crafted by hand!

name: Tee for Two Pattern
description:
Tee for Two Pattern by Figgy's

Tee for Two is a raw-edged tee shirt pattern that also includes a tee shirt dress and three sleeve options for all seasons.  It is a quick to assemble, even for those unfamiliar with sewing with knit fabrics.  The slim-fit shirt can be made short of long-sleeved, and includes embellishment techniques.  The dress can be made super girly with scrap flower appliques or sporty to paired with jeans. 
  
Size 8Y-14Y

name: Jane Dress and Blouse Pattern
description:
Jane Dress and Blouse Pattern by Figgy's 

A whimsical, loose-fitting feminine dress or sophisticated, billowy blouse.  Two sleeve and belt options to welcome the spring but last all year. The pattern features elastic shoulders for ease of dressing with plenty of room for the little ones to feel comfortable. This is a perfect pattern for a beginner sewist. 

Sizes: 18 months - 6/7

name: Wiksten Tova Pattern
description:
Wiksten Tova Pattern

Limited edition sewing pattern on durable paper, enclosed in a glassine envelope with a handmade sticker. Intermediate level sewing skills required. Size options include XS/S/M or M/L/XL Instructions with black and white photos and sketches are included, as well as patterns for both top and dress.

fabric width:	42-45",	53-60" 
top yardage:	2 1/2 yds,	2 yds 
dress yardage:	3 1/2 yds,	3 yds

Handmade in Iowa

name: Wiksten Tank Pattern
description:
Wiksten Tank Pattern

Limited edition sewing pattern on durable paper, enclosed in a glassine envelope with a handmade sticker. Beginner level sewing skills required. Size options include XS/S/M or M/L/XL. Instructions with black and white photos and sketches are included, as well as patterns for both top and dress.

fabric width:	42-45",	53-60" 
top yardage:	2.5 yds,	1.5 yds 
dress yardage:	3 yds,	2 yds

Handmade in Iowa

name: Sewcial Lounge Tote Bag
description:
Spread your love of The Sewcial Lounge with this oversized tote bag is constructed from durable Poly-Cotton. It is a great environmentally conscious alternative to plastic bags featuring dual handles, is large enough to carry a variety of products.

Poly-Cotton (50% Polyester / 50% Cotton) 
Dimensions: 17 " x 18 1/2" 
Depth: 4 1/2" (11.4cm)
